Definition.WordDefinition: AFRICAN, n. A nigger that votes our way.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: African \Af"ri*can\, n. A native of Africa; also one ethnologically belonging to an African race. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
African \Af"ri*can\, a. [L. Africus, Africanus, fr. Afer African.] Of or pertaining to Africa. [1913 Webster]
{African hemp}, a fiber prepared from the leaves of the {Sanseviera Guineensis}, a plant found in Africa and India.
{African marigold}, a tropical American plant ({Tagetes erecta}).
{African oak} or {African teak}, a timber furnished by {Oldfieldia Africana}, used in ship building. [1913 Webster]
{African violet} .
{African-American}, see {African-American}. [1913 Webster]
African adj : of or relating to the nations of Africa or their peoples; "African languages" n : a native or inhabitant of Africa
